casebody.data:
FRIDAY INVESTMENTS, LLC
v.
BALLY TOTAL FITNESS OF THE MID-ATLANTIC, INC., et al. 248PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 27, 2017 Lisa G. Godfrey, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Peter R. Fenn, Attorney at Law, Ira H. Grolman, Attorney at Law, Stacy C. Cordes, Attorney at Law, for Bally Total Fitness of the Mid-Atlantic, Inc., et al. Keith B. Nichols, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Samuel S. Kohn, Attorney at Law, for Friday Investments, LLC.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Reply Brief filed on the 23rd of February 2017 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of February 2017."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 27th day of March 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
